head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths AMOS, JOAN G.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths AMOS, JOAN G.

block.p: AMOS-Joan G. Peacefully on June 12, 2000. Beloved wife of James G. (Pastor of the Lutheran Church of Gustavus Adolphus). Funeral services will take place on Saturday, June 17, 2000, at 7PM at the Gustavus Adolphus Church, 155 East 22 St., NYC. Interment will take place on Tuesday, June 20, 2000 at Southlawn Cemetery, Stark County, Ohio. In lieu of flowers contributions can be made in Joan's memory to the Gustavus Adolphus Church Scholarship Fund, 155 East 22 Street, New York, NY 10010. For information contact the Gannon Funeral Home, 212-532-6579.
